job.name: SFTP

variable.name: HOST
variable.description: Hostname or IP address of the SFTP server. Default value is localhost

variable.name: PORT
variable.description: The listening port of the SFTP server. Default value is 22

variable.name: AUTHENTICATION_METHOD
variable.description: Authentication method to use either password or private key

variable.name: USERNAME
variable.description: SFTP server user name

variable.name: SSH_PASSWORD
variable.description: SSH server password

variable.name: PASSPHRASE
variable.description: SSH private key passphrase

variable.name: SSH_PRIVATE_KEY
variable.description: SSH private key

variable.name: AUTHENTICATION_METHOD_HANDLER
variable.model: PA:SPEL(variables['AUTHENTICATION_METHOD'] == 'SSH_PASSWORD' ? showVar('SSH_PASSWORD') && hideVar('SSH_PRIVATE_KEY') && hideVar('PASSPHRASE') && t(models['SSH_PASSWORD'] = 'PA:CREDENTIAL') && t(variables['SSH_PASSWORD'] = 'sftp://${USERNAME}@${HOST}') && t(models['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = '') : showVar('SSH_PRIVATE_KEY') && showVar('PASSPHRASE') && hideVar('SSH_PASSWORD') && t(models['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = 'PA:CREDENTIAL') && t(variables['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = 'ssh_key://${USERNAME}@${HOST}') && t(models['SSH_PASSWORD'] = ''))
variable.description: Handler which enables SSH_PASSWORD field or SSH_PRIVATE_KEY based on the chosen AUTHENTICATION_METHOD

variable.name: FILE_PATTERN
variable.description: Either a file name or a wildcard string pattern (e.g. file.txt, *.txt, **)

job.description: Workflow template composed of two tasks to Import /Export file(s) from/to an SFTP server.

task.name: Import_from_SFTP_Server
task.description: This task allows to import locally (data space) files from an SFTP (SSH FTP) server. The task requires the following third-party credential: {key: sftp://<username>@<hostname>, value: PASSWORD}. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

variable.name: HOST
variable.description: Hostname or IP address of the SFTP server. Default value is localhost

variable.name: PORT
variable.description: The listening port of the SFTP server. Default value is 22

variable.name: USERNAME
variable.description: SFTP server user name

variable.name: SSH_PASSWORD
variable.description: Third-party credential storing the password associated with the given user name

variable.name: PASSPHRASE
variable.description: SSH private key passphrase

variable.name: SSH_PRIVATE_KEY
variable.description: SSH private key

variable.name: AUTHENTICATION_METHOD
variable.description: Authentication method to use either password or private key

variable.name: AUTHENTICATION_METHOD_HANDLER
variable.model: PA:SPEL(variables['AUTHENTICATION_METHOD'] == 'SSH_PASSWORD' ? showVar('SSH_PASSWORD') && hideVar('SSH_PRIVATE_KEY') && hideVar('PASSPHRASE') && t(models['SSH_PASSWORD'] = 'PA:CREDENTIAL') && t(variables['SSH_PASSWORD'] = 'sftp://${USERNAME}@${HOST}') && t(models['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = '') : showVar('SSH_PRIVATE_KEY') && showVar('PASSPHRASE') && hideVar('SSH_PASSWORD') && t(models['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = 'PA:CREDENTIAL') && t(variables['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = 'ssh_key://${USERNAME}@${HOST}') && t(models['SSH_PASSWORD'] = ''))
variable.description: Handler which enables SSH_PASSWORD field or SSH_PRIVATE_KEY based on the chosen AUTHENTICATION_METHOD

variable.name: FILE_PATTERN
variable.description: Either a file name or a wildcard string pattern (e.g. file.txt, *.txt, **)

variable.name: REMOTE_BASE
variable.description: A remote relative path on the SFTP server from which we import file(s). $REMOTE_BASE can be either a path to a folder terminated by / or an empty value for the root (e.g. REMOTE/)

variable.name: LOCAL_BASE
variable.description: An absolute path or a relative path of a folder inside the Global Data Space in which the downloaded data will be stored. LOCAL_BASE can be either a path to a folder terminated by / or an empty value for the root (e.g. LOCAL/, /absolute/path/LOCAL/)

variable.name: MOVE_FILE
variable.description: If true, delete imported file(s) in the remote SFTP server
If true, import only missing files
variable.name: SYNC_FILES

task.name: Export_to_SFTP_Server
task.description: This task allows to export files to an SFTP (SSH FTP) server. The task requires the following third-party credential: {key: sftp://<username>@<host>, value: PASSWORD}. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

variable.name: HOST
variable.description: Hostname or IP address of the SFTP server. Default value is localhost

variable.name: PORT
variable.description: The listening port of the SFTP server. Default value is 22

variable.name: USERNAME
variable.description: SFTP server user name

variable.name: SSH_PASSWORD
variable.description: Third-party credential storing the password associated with the given user name

variable.name: PASSPHRASE
variable.description: SSH private key passphrase

variable.name: SSH_PRIVATE_KEY
variable.description: SSH private key

variable.name: AUTHENTICATION_METHOD
variable.description: Authentication method to use either password or private key

variable.name: AUTHENTICATION_METHOD_HANDLER
variable.model: PA:SPEL(variables['AUTHENTICATION_METHOD'] == 'SSH_PASSWORD' ? showVar('SSH_PASSWORD') && hideVar('SSH_PRIVATE_KEY') && hideVar('PASSPHRASE') && t(models['SSH_PASSWORD'] = 'PA:CREDENTIAL') && t(variables['SSH_PASSWORD'] = 'sftp://${USERNAME}@${HOST}') && t(models['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = '') : showVar('SSH_PRIVATE_KEY') && showVar('PASSPHRASE') && hideVar('SSH_PASSWORD') && t(models['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = 'PA:CREDENTIAL') && t(variables['SSH_PRIVATE_KEY'] = 'ssh_key://${USERNAME}@${HOST}') && t(models['SSH_PASSWORD'] = ''))
variable.description: Handler which enables SSH_PASSWORD field or SSH_PRIVATE_KEY based on the chosen AUTHENTICATION_METHOD

variable.name: FILE_PATTERN
variable.description: Either a file name or a wildcard string pattern (e.g. file.txt, *.txt, **)

variable.name: REMOTE_BASE
variable.description: The remote relative path on the SFTP server where exported file(s) will be stored. $REMOTE_BASE can be either a path to a folder terminated by / or an empty value for the root (e.g. REMOTE/)

variable.name: LOCAL_BASE
variable.description: An absolute path or a relative path of a folder inside the Global Data Space from which we export file(s) to the SFTP server. LOCAL_BASE can be either a path to a folder terminated by / or an empty value for the root (e.g. LOCAL/, /absolute/path/LOCAL/)

variable.name: MOVE_FILE
variable.description: If true, delete imported file(s) in the remote SFTP server

metadata.visualization:
Import_from_SFTP_Server
 Export_to_SFTP_Server
